= Third Party Library =

== Python ==
Download and install [http://www.python.org/download/ Python 2.5] or later for runtime and compile, copy the files in %PYTHON_HOME%\include folder and Python25.lib from %PYTHON_HOME%\ libs, to the 3rd party folder %PYV8_HOME%\lib\python

== Boost ==
PyV8 use [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/release/libs/python/doc/ boost::python] for interoperability
